website_summaries.verdict: Offers a lot of special features at a decent price, including a weighted bag system that works well on hard ground when stakes won't.
pros: Comes with plastic stakes or small bags that you fill with sand or rocks to hold it down
cons: Hard to get back into its case
Some of these arrive with tears or holes in the fabric

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for extremely hard ground.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the variety of landing pads, this is the most versatile when it comes to hard ground. The little sand bags make all the difference when you have extremely hard ground. Obviously one can't use the stakes on such ground. This is a clean solution. One does not need to use sand. I use rocks that I find in the launch area. It doesn't need much weight to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Hohl

customer_reviews.title: Bags not attached
customer_reviews.text: Seems great, haven’t used it for real yet. Once complaint is, the little bags aren’t attached in any way to the landing pad, will have to buy some clips myself. Since the bags were the reason I bought this particular pad, but they’re not usable as purchased, 3 stars. Hope that’s not too harsh, guys. Bags you can add weight to is an excellent idea, for little gusts of wind.
customer_reviews.author: j.w.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Two sided with a different color scheme on each side. Comes with stakes to hold it down or bags to fill with sand if used on a hard surface. Also comes in a nice carring bag. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Growls

customer_reviews.title: In my case, it works just like the description.
customer_reviews.text: It is all I would expect from it. The materials are thick and it seems to be well put together. If you what to use the pouches to fill them up with rocks, keep in mind they will not fit on the travel bag anymore. Since the travel bag is just big enought to have everything on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sal

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's a good item to have. Never good to have debris fly up into electric motors. easy to unfold and fold! Comes with pieces to tack it down to the ground as well! Thank you Seller!!!! From Alaska!
customer_reviews.author: Max Power

customer_reviews.title: I unpacked it, and examined the quality. Haven't used it yet...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price folks! This should be a necessity for any serious drone pilot. But, it's not something to get all excited about. In the whole scheme of things, this is dust.
customer_reviews.author: HawaiianEyeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for you drone
customer_reviews.text: great for my my marvic pro, solid, study material , I highly recommened this landing pad
customer_reviews.author: cobra 4

customer_reviews.title: No brainer. A+
customer_reviews.text: The fact it has bags and stakes to hold it down was a no brainer..good color and great size..it fits inside my Drone backpack.
customer_reviews.author: MOOREFIREPOWER

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to drone-ers toolkit
customer_reviews.text: It works well to launch my drone (mavick pro) from the beach. It prevents sand from getting in the lens and helps create a flat surface for launching in uneven terrain. It also folds up and travels very well - fits right inside my backpack. It makes for a great landing spot because the bright spot makes it easy to find in dark terrain. I used this launchpad on the beach and in my grass yard.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, works perfectly for a medium (Mavic Pro, Parot BeBop, GoPro Karma) sized quad.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Seemed perfect, but on further inspection...
customer_reviews.text: ...there was a small (1 cm) tear/hole in the black fabric which covers the frame. I literally just got it handed to me by the UPS driver about 5 minutes ago. I opened it, unfolded the landing pad, and saw the small tear. Oh well, I guess I will put a small piece of duct tape on it. It will function just fine, I'm sure, but hadn't even used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Leatherwood

customer_reviews.title: Folds nicely and fits into its carry package for easier transport
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. Provides a very smooth takeoff/landing surface. Folds nicely and fits into its carry package for easier transport.
customer_reviews.author: biffsteele

customer_reviews.title: Great landing pad
customer_reviews.text: Great landing pad! Nice and big for my Yuneek Breeze , packs right up into my back pack and provides a nice surface to land on for my drone!
customer_reviews.author: Philip L.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice , better than first thought . After a few times folding it very easy to work with .
customer_reviews.author: Northsman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to save my motors from the Arizona desert sands. Well made bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: A Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Heli Pad
customer_reviews.text: unfolds and folds easily. Material is nice and taught. Keeps any sand or grass out of the delicate parts of the drone. A++
customer_reviews.author: M Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, zipper works well
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the price. Great quality, zipper works well. Sand bags a must if the ground is frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Estelle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. My husband was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: savanna

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money, this must be worth more ...
customer_reviews.text: Value for your money, this must be worth more than $10 that I paid for it, very high Quality
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made landing pad! You can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hoonetic

customer_reviews.title: Great Launch Pad - Bad Stitching on Bag
customer_reviews.text: This pad is a great size for launching most drones and is very portable. The Pad seems to be well made but the stitching on the carrying bag is very poor. To avoid the hassle of returning this, I will re-sew the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great landing pad
customer_reviews.text: I have a DJI Spark and this is a perfect sized launch and landing pad. It comes with a very nice bag and stakes to secure the landing pad in windy situations. The material is a very high quality which appears to be water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: KOliverson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product it keeps my toy out of the grass and less chances to mess up the blades
customer_reviews.author: Charles Liddell

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Folds up compactly, makes a great takeoff/landing pad for drones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AN AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: AN AMAZING PRODUCT!!! Incredible price for the amazing product they send!!! In all aspect, is big enough for all drones, like Mavic Pro, Phamton 4, spark, mavic air, and other models... que quality on materials, color, size, bag, pin are SIMPLY AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on the beach and/or tall grass
customer_reviews.text: Afraid to hand launch? Here's your answer. Helps your drone lock in it's home, too.
customer_reviews.author: USERBOSCO

product_meta.title: Virhuck RC Drone Landing Pad, Fast-Fold Helicopter Landing Pad for DJI Mavic Pro, Phantom 1/2/3/4 Pro, Inspire 2/1, 3DR Solo, Syma or Other Quadcopter, Orange
feature_bullets: Strong oxford material: protect your drone from sand, mud, water etc.
Two tightening tools as you want: Plastic nails or bags filled in sand, stones etc, keep it from blowing away.
Portable and easy to fold: high quality memory steel, not easy to deformation.
Suit for night flight: Reflective paint design, reflect light to navigate for landing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
